lead_paragraph: The Australian Open is not the first event held in extreme heat: sports organizations have been ignoring high temperatures for years, paying little regard to athletes.
snippet: The Australian Open is not the first event held in extreme heat: sports organizations have been ignoring high temperatures for years, paying little regard to athletes.
